author: wtopstaff
title: Clippers waive Chuck Hayes
text:
Home » News » Sports » NBA » Clippers waive Chuck Hayes Clippers waive Chuck Hayes By The Associated Press October 24, 2015 10:54 pm 
LOS ANGELES (AP) — The Clippers have waived center-power forward Chuck Hayes, who signed with the team nearly two months ago. 
He averaged 0.5 points and 2.5 rebounds in four preseason games with the team. 
The roster stands at 15 heading into the Clippers’ season opener next week. 
The move was announced Saturday. Topics:
